idea-plugin.name: SmartSort
idea-plugin.description: SmartSort allows you to sort your code without breaking it's structure. Take for example a CSS or JSON file: if you sort the whole thing in a lexical order alone, it will lose it's entire structure. SmartSort will sort in a hierarchical manner in order to sort everything without breaking your code.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial implementation. No changes, just creation.
